name: Darth Vader, More Machine Than Man
Lore: 'Dark Lord of the Sith. Servant of Emperor''s. Encased in armor with cybernetic life support. Student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Was the best starpilot in the galaxy. Cunning warrior.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  [Vader] cards never deploy unless Rise Of The Dark Lord on table.  Once per turn, if at a site you control, may apply his ability to draw battle destiny elsewhere.  Immune to Clash Of Sabers and attrition < 5.  May not be Disarmed.',
